net.sf.wubiq.remote

Class RemoteClientManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.wubiq.remote.RemoteClientManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RemoteClientManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Manages remote print clients. Each instance of RemoteClient represents a connected client.
    Author:
    Federico Alcantara
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getRemoteClient

                                    boolean doNotUpdateAccessedTime)

        Parameters:
        uuid - Unique identifier to look for.
        doNotUpdateAccessedTime - If true the accessed time is not updated.
        Returns:
        The client or null.

        Parameters:
        uuid - Unique id of the remote client.
